## center() function

Returns the vector `x`<!-- -->, shifted so that its mean is at 0

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function center<S>(x: Vector<S>): Vector<S>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  x | <code>Vector&lt;S&gt;</code> | The vector to center |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Vector<S>`
